rows.label: qst104219_msg0001
rows.name: It is you. It has been some time.

rows.label: qst104219_msg0002
rows.name:
As for me, I am still
investigating the ancient
things around this village.

rows.label: qst104219_msg0003
rows.name:
I've grasped a fair amount, and wish
to spread what can be learned from
history to the villagers, but...

rows.label: qst104219_msg0004
rows.name:
It seems they are all more
preoccupied with their missions
than with an old man's lecture.

rows.label: qst104219_msg0005
rows.name:
I cannot return to Superbia either...
I am at a bit of a standstill.

rows.label: qst104219_msg0006
rows.name:
I, a history teacher?
In Iyasaki Village?

rows.label: qst104219_msg0007
rows.name:
If I recall, there is an ancient
place there called the Village
Guardian... Interesting.

rows.label: qst104219_msg0008
rows.name: If you'll have me, I accept.

rows.label: qst104219_msg0051
rows.name: Invite Hassane to be a teacher?

rows.label: qst104219_msg0061
rows.name:
If it is decided, then
I shall act at once.

rows.label: qst104219_msg0062
rows.name:
Once I've gathered my
materials and luggage, I
will head for Iyasaki Village.

rows.label: qst104219_msg0081
rows.name: I see. That is a pity.

rows.label: qst104219_msg0082
rows.name:
If only the strong mercenaries
here would show a little
more interest...

rows.label: qst104219_msg0101
rows.name:
If you're still offering the teaching
position, I would be happy to accept.
Are you sure you want me?

rows.label: qst104219_msg0151
rows.name:
A history teacher... Oh,
has it been decided already?
That is unfortunate.

rows.label: qst104219_msg0201
rows.name:
Such opportunities are rare, and
even if they arise, someone else
will likely have taken them.
